131.content:
Craig was walking into his work, for the first time since school let out in the summer. He worked at the local high school, so he always enjoyed having his entire summer off. This last summer was pretty awful. He and his wife had recently divorced, so he was dealing with that for most of it. He was just happy he could start a new school year at work and put this all behind him.

Craig was the high school gym teacher. It was pretty apparent by his appearance. He was a well built man, and tall too. He had always been good at sports. While taking his education degree, he decided that he wanted to teach gym class. So he went through all the proper schooling so he could.

The gym classes were divided into boys and girls at his school. He taught the boys from all grades. Of course there were a few other gym teachers.

Brian, he was around 28 years old. One of the younger teachers in the school. Brian also taught all levels of gym for the boys. It was a fairly large school. Each grade had a couple of classes. Brian was a proud gay man. Most everyone knew it too. No one had a problem with it either. He was fairly toned, definitely not as muscular as Craig. Brian was fairly short in comparison, standing at 5'8".

Amy, she was about 35 years old. She was the oldest gym teacher in the school. She taught grades 9 and 11 gym for the girls. Amy was a tall, slender, athletic woman. She had shoulder length hair that was always in a tight ponytail. She had a fairly average sized chest. She stood at about 5'11".

Bianca, she was about 25. She was one of the youngest staff members. Also one of the newest. She taught grades 10 and 12 gym for the girls. She was shorter, standing at about 5'6". Though she was fairly built as well. She was, well let's say well endowed in her chest.

Craig was always extra early for work. He loved to have time to just relax and have a coffee before having to deal with students. He sat in the gym office, drinking his coffee. His coworkers strolled in, one at a time. Amy, then Brian, and finally Bianca. Bianca was always last, and always managed to make it just before the first bell. Due to the size of the school, they actually had 2 gyms. So they could have at least 3 classes going on indoors at once.

Craig always had first period with Amy. Bianca had first period in the other gym. Brian basically did office work during downtime, or helped Craig with his class. The grade 11 class was always first. Bianca had the grade 10 class in the other gym. Since it was the first day back at school for everyone, there wasn't much office work to do, so Brian would help Craig with his class.

The first few classes of the year were mostly warm ups, and straight up cardio. They were getting the students back into the swing of gym class. They knew most of them wouldn't do any physical activity in summer, so this was their way to break them in.

There were a few students in class that the teachers favored of course. Typically the more athletic ones of course. The first class was not easy for most of the students, so they would all groan and complain about all the work they had to do. Class continued on, however, someone at the school gained a new ability over the summer. They were going to try it out here. They had gained the ability to swap traits between others, or to swap traits from others to themselves. Who was it?

Chris had been staring at this unmarked shipping box for almost ten minutes now. Part of him was afraid to open it up, as he had just found it sitting in front of his apartment door when he had returned home from that day’s set of classes. The other part of him, however, felt a sense of curiosity. What could be sealed inside? Almost as if his hand was moving on its own accord, Chris took his room key and sliced open the tape that covered the box’s opening flaps.

When Chris flipped up the box’s flaps up, removed the top layer of Styrofoam, and peered inside, he discovered what the treasure that was held within: it was a medium-sized tablet, sleek and minimalistic in design. The device already came with a protective screen applied.

Chris then pulled the tablet out of the box, but he did not find an instructional manual anywhere in the container. He guessed that whoever sent him this tablet was on the paperless instructions bandwagon. Seeing that he had no other directions, Chris held down what he assumed was the power button on the side of the tablet. After a second or two, the tablet’s screen flashed on and a video of a professionally dressed woman appeared on the screen.

”On behalf of Swap Inc., we are happy to announce that you have been randomly selected to participate as a beta-tester for our newest and most fantastic devices” the woman said.

What you are holding now is the Pygmalion 6. More powerful than our remote models, the Pygmalion 6 provides the user the most control over the swaps the user initiates.

15254.title: Britney

Britney swaps two strangers with each other
152541.content:
The clock read 3:00 A.M. and Britney was still awake. Despite having gone out barhopping with her roommates that night, she just couldn't sleep. She wasn't sure why, but she'd been dealing with a bit of insomnia lately. She wasn't just lying in bed fruitlessly attempting to sleep, however. She was reading a book.

Britney wasn't much of a reader normally, but she'd found an old book on the supernatural at a thrift store a few days ago that caught her fancy. She thought it might serve as some inspiration for her music. It was old, from like the 1930s or older, she thought, and covered a wide range of supernatural topics. It was all probably bullshit, but it was pretty damn interesting and it would be great inspiration. Due to her insomnia, she'd taken to reading it late at night.

As she was reading, Britney came across two pages that were stuck together. It didn't seem like there was something sticky had been spilled on them, but more like some unseen force was holding them together. Curiosity getting the better of her, she decided to try to pry them apart. They didn't want to move at first, but after she pulled a bit harder, they flew apart.

"Oh shit!" Britney gasped in surprise, dropping the book on the bed as a rush of cloud-like shadows spewed out from the pages.

Eventually, the shadows stopped flowing out from the book. They then began to condense just above the bed, forming into a roughly humanoid shape.

"At last," a sinister, whispery voice said. "Freedom."

"Shit, I must really be sleep deprived," Britney muttered.

"Ah, my liberator," the voice said as what Britney assumed was the shadow's head looked down at her. "As good a host as any, I suppose."

Before Britney could even react, the shadow flew at her. It collapsed back into smokey clouds and entered her body through her nose and open mouth. She could barely breathe as the shadowy clouds forced their way inside her. Once whatever the thing was had fully entered, Britney passed out and collapsed onto her bed.

---


"What the fuck?!" Britney shouted, bolting upright in bed. She looked around in a panic, but soon calmed down. Everything seemed normal. "Must've been a dream," she reasoned.

The clock now read 8:00 A.M. She must've fallen asleep reading the book now lying on her bed and had a crazy dream. Yeah, that had to be it.

Getting up from the bed, Britney threw on the jeans and tank top she'd worn the night before then took another look around. Early morning light was now flitting in through the window and Britney was sure she wouldn't be getting back to sleep now.

"Good morning," a sinister voice suddenly whispered, this time as if within Britney's head.

Britney jumped. "What the hell?"

"No it wasn't a dream," the voice said, responding to Britney's thoughts as she thought them.

"What-- what are you?"

"A good question. I guess you could say I'm a magical entity. You'll have to forgive my ... intrusion, but I had little choice. I am grateful for you freeing me from that dreadful book, but I am not yet strong enough to survive on my own."

"So you're .. inside me?"

"Yes, until I regain my full power. But that's something you can help me with."

"If I can get you out of me faster, I'll do whatever I can to help."

"You're a smart woman."

"What do you need me to do?" Britney asked.

And so the entity explained itself. It had the power to swap any traits between people and control who was aware of them, but it was too weak right now. It needed to rely on the strength of a host to do anything. With each swap, it would slowly regrow its power. Due to its weakened state, however, it needed Britney to do the swapping for it ... or so it claimed. Britney had no reason to doubt it, though ... or so she thought.

The entity explained how its power worked and how Britney was supposed to activate it and then it sent her on her way. Stepping out into the living room of the apartment she shared with her roommates, she took a look around.

Kim lay passed out on the couch, having not made it to her room. Typical, Britney thought.

Then there was Nikki. She'd left her door open again and Britney could see her lying in bed with the dude she'd hooked up with last night at the bar. Both were also passed out. Again? Britney thought to herself.

Looking out the window next, Britney saw that there were plenty of people to swap out there as well. She certainly had options.

"Come on, make a swap," the entity's voice urged her from inside her head.

"Be patient," Britney quietly hissed back. Mulling over her options, Britney thought about what she was going to do.

info.brief_description: Someone swaps traits with people in various scenario's.
info.description:
This story is about our main character swapping traits with other people because of various conditions.
Multiple main characters will be available and will be described in the character selection, feel free to suggest any additional characters.
Side characters can be added as you wish as long as their inclusion fits the character and story, some side characters (like girlfriends or family members) could be predetermined within descriptions as well.

Have fun with the story without many limitations, just the usual stuff like no unnecessary deaths or gore, keep it fun for everyone (above 18 at least).
Make sure you keep the swaps descriptive and interesting, sex is fine, but don't overuse it as it is not the main focus of the story.
As well as this, try to make sure the chapters stay interesting and different, chapter which contradict previous chapter will be deleted.

Try to write decently sized chapters, after the first few branches do not create chapters containing only a few sentences , these will be deleted if they get out of hand.
The style of writing will be in third person, please keep this theme throughout the story.

On a more positive note! I will recognize good chapters in some form, which will usually be in the form of points.

Other than these rules, have fun with it and let you imagination go wild! *Smile*

If you enjoy this story, check out my sister series:
https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/2187108-A-curious-clothes-exchange...

(Sidenote: If you want to see a story continued or want to see it take a certain direction, but don't feel like writing it yourself, feel free to send me a message and I'll see what I can do! *Smile*)
